snippet: THEMO--Mary. Beloved sister of Helen, Sylvia and Victor passed away on Tuesday, March 22, 2016 in New York City. Funeral services are private with burial in the family plot at Mt. Auburn Cemetery, Cambridge, Massachusetts. In lieu of flowers, contributions to the cancer society or a charity of your choice will be appreciated. 1/3
lead_paragraph: THEMO--Mary. Beloved sister of Helen, Sylvia and Victor passed away on Tuesday, March 22, 2016 in New York City. Funeral services are private with burial in the family plot at Mt. Auburn Cemetery, Cambridge, Massachusetts. In lieu of flowers, contributions to the cancer society or a charity of your choice will be appreciated. 1/3
